tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The chart below gives information about the growth of urban population in certain parts of the world including the prediction of the future.

images.altText: Chart showing growth of urban population

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: In some countries, young people have become richer, healthier, and live longer, but they are less happy. What are the causes? What can be done to address this situation?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
